org.genepattern.module
Class VisualizerUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.genepattern.module.VisualizerUtil

public class VisualizerUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A class containing static convenience methods for tasks that are frequently encountered when writing GenePattern visualizers.

getDatasetParser

public static DatasetParser getDatasetParser(java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                                             java.lang.String pathname)
Gets an dataset parser that can read the document at the given pathname or null if no parser is found. Brings up an error message dialog if an error occurs.

Parameters:
parentComponent - determines the Frame in which the dialog is displayed; if null, or if the parentComponent
pathname - A pathname string
Returns:
The expression parser

pathname - The file pathname

readDataset

public static java.lang.Object readDataset(java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                                           DatasetParser parser,
                                           java.lang.String pathname,
                                           DatasetCreator<?> creator)
Reads the dataset at the given pathname. The type of the returned object is determined by the creator argument. Brings up an error message dialog if an error occurs.

Parameters:
parentComponent - determines the Frame in which the dialog is displayed; if null, or if the parentComponent
parser - The dataset parser
pathname - The file pathname
creator - The dataset creator
Returns:
An object containing the dataset

                              java.lang.String pathname,
                              OdfHandler handler)
Parses the odf document at the given pathname using the specified handler

Parameters:
parentComponent - determines the Frame in which the dialog is displayed; if null, or if the parentComponent
pathname - A pathname string
handler - The odf handler
Returns:
true if the odf document was read successfully

write

public static java.lang.String write(java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                                     Dataset data,
                                     java.lang.String formatName,
                                     java.lang.String pathname,
                                     boolean checkFileExtension)
Writes dataset to a file in the given format. The correct file extension will be added to the pathname if it is not present. If there is already a file present at the given pathname, its contents are discarded. Brings up an error message dialog if an error occurs.

Parameters:
parentComponent - determines the Frame in which the dialog is displayed; if null, or if the parentComponent
data - the dataset.
formatName - a String containing the informal name of a format (e.g., "res" or "gct".)
pathname - a pathname string
checkFileExtension - Whether the correct file extension will be added to the pathname if it is not present.
Returns:
The pathname that the data was saved to

writeCls

public static java.lang.String writeCls(java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                                        ClassVector cv,
                                        java.lang.String pathname,
                                        boolean checkFileExtension)
Writes the given class vector to a file. Brings up an error message dialog if an error occurs.

Parameters:
parentComponent - determines the Frame in which the dialog is displayed; if null, or if the parentComponent
cv - The class vector
pathname - A pathname string
checkFileExtension - Whether the correct file extension will be added to the pathname if it is not present.
Returns:
The pathname that the data was saved to
